def_en: Pills are small solid round masses of medicine or vitamins that you swallow without chewing.
If a woman is on the pill, she takes a special pill that prevents her from becoming pregnant.

def_cn: 不得不承受的苦事；不得不接受的现实
def_en: If a person or group has to accept a failure or an unpleasant piece of news, you can say that it was a bitter pill or a bitter pill to swallow .

def_cn: 把苦药包上糖衣；使不愉快的事变得较易接受
def_en: If someone does something to sweeten the pill or sugar the pill, they do it to make some unpleasant news or an unpleasant measure more acceptable.
